mapper.insert: insert into t_cfg_user (id, customer_id, user_name, password, true_name, user_type, phone, email, create_time, update_time) values (#{id}, #{customerId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{trueName}, #{userType}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select tmp1.*, tmp1.customerName, tmp2.roleIds from (select u.*, c.name customerName from t_cfg_user u left join t_cfg_customer c on u.customer_id = c.id) tmp1, (select GROUP_CONCAT(ur.role_id) roleIds, u1.id user_id from t_cfg_user u1 left join t_cfg_userrole ur on u1.id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u1.id) tmp2
tmp1.id = tmp2.user_id and u.user_name like '%${userName}%' and u.true_name like '%${trueName}%' and u.phone like '%${phone}%' and u.customer_id = #{customerId} and c.name like '%${customerName}%'
select user_name as userName from t_cfg_user
